11834.quoteText: We and our partners use various technologies to collect information automatically when you access and use the Services, including cookies, web beacons and other similar technologies.
11834.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11835.quoteText: For example, third parties may use cookies to deliver advertisements to you based on your visit to the Services.
11835.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

11836.quoteText: Zillow Group may collect the location of your device, which we use to provide you with location-based information and advertising.
11836.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

11837.quoteText:
We participate in interest-based advertising.
This means that when you use the Services, we or third party service providers or advertisers may use cookies (that they collect or that we provide to them) or other similar technologies to collect information about your use of the Services (including mobile applications) or your online activities over time and across different websites and devices.
11837.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

11838.quoteText: The Services do not otherwise respond to ‘do not track’ signals.
11838.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
